subdefinitions.definition: Any place, real or imagined, where the value of a thing is settled.

definitions.definition: A meeting of stamp collectors and/or dealers, where stamps and covers are sold or exchanged.
The swollen basal part of an inflorescence axis at the onset of fruit development; it bears leaves whose axillary buds differentiate and may grow out as shoots .

secondary_definitions: ( philately ) A meeting of stamp collectors and/or dealers, where stamps and covers are sold or exchanged.
( botany ) The swollen basal part of an inflorescence axis at the onset of fruit development; it bears leaves whose axillary buds differentiate and may grow out as shoots .
